title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Course for Improving Physics Experimentation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic physics theory and experience with laboratory equipment
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can independently establish experimental procedures by applying physical laws and theories during the experimental design phase.
Learners can accurately collect and analyze experimental data using digital measuring equipment and calculate uncertainties.
Based on flipped learning materials, learners can scientifically interpret experimental results and submit reports according to established criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
